comments.content: I would like to know witch typeface is Fondation pour l'art contemporain, Thank you!!

Appears to be Baskerville eText, a version by Linotype made specifically for digital use:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/baskerville-etext/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150221015941/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/baskerville-etext/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/baskerville-etext/")
